dashboard.label: Leaderboard
dashboard.definition: {"visualizations":{"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"heatmap","drilldown":"none","count":3},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Top 3 Longest Search Queries"},"viz_table_2":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"heatmap","drilldown":"none","count":5},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"title":"Most Queries (Unique) Submitted"},"viz_table_3":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"heatmap","drilldown":"none","count":2},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"Longest RunDuration"},"viz_table_4":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","count":100},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"Results"},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.bar","options":{"wrap":true,"rowNumbers":false,"dataOverlayMode":"none","count":100,"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.enabled":0,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"gaps","chart.showDataLabels":"none","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"all","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisMiddle","legend.placement":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"Total Points"}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee | spath | eval search_length=len('custom.search') | table results{}.contestant host custom.search search_length | sort - search_length | rename results{}.contestant AS Contestant","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}}},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee | spath | stats dc(custom.search) as count by host results{}.contestant | sort - count | rename results{}.contestant AS Contestant","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=spl_bee | spath | stats max(runDuration) by custom.search host results{}.contestant | sort - \"max(runDuration)\" | rename results{}.contestant AS Contestant","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splbee_scoreboard.csv | stats sum(Bonus) as Total_Points sum(Correct) as Total_Correct avg(Duration) as Avg_Duration by Contestant host | sort - Total_Points","queryParameters":{"earliest":"0"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splbee_scoreboard.csv | stats sum(Bonus) as Total_Points by Contestant | sort - Total_Points","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$time_token.earliest$","latest":"$time_token.latest$"}}}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Select A Time Range:","options":{"token":"time_token","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"}},"input_2":{"type":"input.dropdown","title":"Show Other Stats?","options":{"token":"award_token","defaultValue":"no","items":[{"value":"yes","label":"Yes"},{"value":"no","label":"No"}]}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1000},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_table_2","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":250,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_table_3","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":500,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_table_4","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":0,"w":600,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1","input_2"]},"description":"","title":"Leaderboard"}
